issue.title: [Integration] Add endianness "gold" integration file for decimal256
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Decimal256 data is missing from the current little-/big-endian "gold" integration files in the arrow-testing repository:

<https://github.com/apache/arrow-testing/tree/master/data/arrow-ipc-stream/integration/1.0.0-littleendian>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11666?focusedCommentId=17285887) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
cc `[~kiszk]` could you do this? It requires generating the files on both a little- and big-endian platform.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11666?focusedCommentId=17286331) by Kazuaki Ishizaki (kiszk):*
Sure, I will do this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11666?focusedCommentId=17321902) by Kazuaki Ishizaki (kiszk):*
This was already merged at <https://github.com/apache/arrow-testing/pull/58>
